## Introduction 

This vignette provides reproducible R code to extract disturbance data from the ReefCloud server. The processing includes applying time lags and adjusting values based on whether surveys occurred before or after disturbance impacts within a given year.

```{r}
#| include: true
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
#| cache: false
########################################################################
####################### Generate data locations
########################################################################

#Generate sites 
sites<- data.frame(x=c(143.2579, 145.571, 152.3724), y=c(-11.02353, -16.38352, -23.84812)) %>%
  as.matrix() %>%
  sf::st_multipoint() %>% 
  sf::st_sfc(crs=4326) %>% 
  sf::st_cast('POINT') %>%
  sf::st_sf(name=c("Site1", "Site2", "Site3"))

# Generate random years for each site (example: 15 random years per site)
set.seed(123) 
years <- sample(1998:2025, size = 15, replace = FALSE)  # 15 distinct years

# Generate random dates per site
random_dates <- lapply(sites$name, function(site_name) {
  months <- sample(1:12, size = length(years), replace = TRUE)
  days <- sapply(months, function(m) sample(1:days_in_month(ymd(paste0(2000, "-", m, "-01"))), 1))
  data.frame(
    name = site_name,
    year = years,
    date = as.Date(paste(years, months, days, sep = "-"))
  )
}) %>% dplyr::bind_rows()

# Join with sites and arrange
sites_year <- sites %>%
  dplyr::right_join(random_dates, by = "name") %>%
  dplyr::arrange(name, date) %>%
  dplyr::rename(geometry = ".")
``` 

```{r}
#| include: true
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
#| cache: false

########################################################################
####################### Extract DHW and process 
########################################################################
bbox <- sf::st_bbox(sites) %>% sf::st_as_sfc()

# Get information for accessing the Geoserver
get_geoserver_info()

# Get bounding box from sites
sf_use_s2(FALSE)
cov_dhw_full <- get_geoserver_data(cov_name = "reefcloud:degrees_heating_weeks_tier", sites,
                                rc_client = rc_client,
                                timeout_seconds = GEOSERVER_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT,
                                initial_chunk_size = GEOSERVER_DEFAULT_CHUNK_SIZE)  %>%
  dplyr::filter(tier == 4)  %>%
  sf::st_make_valid() 
  
# Ensure CRS compatibility
if (is.na(sf::st_crs(cov_dhw_full))) {
        cov_dhw_full <- sf::st_set_crs(cov_dhw_full, 4326)
      }
 
cov_dhw_full <- cov_dhw_full  %>%
  dplyr::filter(sf::st_intersects(geometry, bbox, sparse = FALSE)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(max_dhw = dhwmax,
         end_date = latest)

sf::sf_use_s2(TRUE)

# Find matching years
years <- intersect(unique(sites_year$year), unique(cov_dhw_full$year))

# Loop over each year and spatially join
sites_with_tier <- purrr::map_dfr(years, function(y) {
  sites_sub <- sites_year %>% dplyr::filter(year == y)
  dhw_sub <- cov_dhw_full  %>% dplyr::filter(year == y)
  
  # Only run join if both subsets are non-empty
  if (nrow(sites_sub) > 0 && nrow(dhw_sub) > 0) {
    sf::st_join(sites_sub, dhw_sub, join = st_within, left = FALSE)
  } else {
    NULL  # skip if empty
  }
})

# safety check
#setequal(sites_with_tier$year.x, sites_with_tier$year.y)

sites_with_tier <- sites_with_tier %>%
 dplyr::rename(year = year.x) %>%
 dplyr::select(- year.y)

cov_dhw <- add_cov_to_data(data = sites_with_tier, cov = cov_dhw_full, cov_name = "dhw")
dplyr::glimpse(cov_dhw)
```


```{r}
#| include: true
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
#| cache: false
########################################################################
####################### Extract cyclone and process
########################################################################
sf_use_s2(FALSE)
cov_cyc_full <- get_geoserver_data(cov_name = "reefcloud:storm4m_exposure_year_tier", sites,
                                rc_client = rc_client,
                                timeout_seconds = GEOSERVER_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT,
                                initial_chunk_size = GEOSERVER_DEFAULT_CHUNK_SIZE) %>%
  dplyr::filter(tier == 4) %>%
  sf::st_simplify(dTolerance = 0.001) 
  
# Ensure CRS compatibility
if (is.na(sf::st_crs(cov_cyc_full))) {
        cov_cyc_full <- sf::st_set_crs(cov_cyc_full, 4326)
      }

  
cov_cyc_full <- cov_cyc_full %>%
  dplyr::filter(st_intersects(geometry, bbox, sparse = FALSE)) %>%
  dplyr::rename(max_cyc = max_hrs,
         year = end_year)

sf::sf_use_s2(TRUE)
# Find matching years
years <- intersect(unique(sites_year$year), unique(cov_cyc_full$year))

# Loop over each year and spatially join
sites_with_tier <- purrr::map_dfr(years, function(y) {
  sites_sub <- sites_year %>% dplyr::filter(year == y)
  cyc_sub <- cov_cyc_full  %>% dplyr::filter(year == y)
  
  # Only run join if both subsets are non-empty
  if (nrow(sites_sub) > 0 && nrow(cyc_sub) > 0) {
    sf::st_join(sites_sub, cyc_sub, join = st_within, left = FALSE)
  } else {
    NULL  # skip if empty
  }
})

# safety check
#setequal(sites_with_tier$year.x, sites_with_tier$year.y)

sites_with_tier <- sites_with_tier %>%
 dplyr::rename(year = year.x) %>%
 dplyr::select(- year.y)

cov_cyc <- add_cov_to_data(data = sites_with_tier, cov = cov_cyc_full, cov_name = "cyc")
dplyr::glimpse(cov_cyc)
```
